node.title: Now that the Winter Games are over, I can get back to
node.author: davido

data.field: The basics. Watching my favorite Reality TV show. Building my headquarters for the revolution. Solving the [http://aleembawany.com/weblog/technophilia/000027_google_billboard_puzzle_the_lazy_way.html|Google puzzle]. Training for 2010. Posting brilliant responses at the [id://131|Monastery]. Enjoying friendly comradery in the Chatterbox. Patching Everything2. Deobfuscating code. Dreaming up [poll ideas quest|polls]. The Future. Work. Doing nothing.
